original_solution_mapping.L1: This week, 80 - 20 = <<80-20=60>>60 people watched the first game.
original_solution_mapping.L2: While 80 + 15 = <<80+15=95>>95 people watched the third game.
original_solution_mapping.L3: A total of 80 + 60 + 95 = <<80+60+95=235>>235 people watched the games this week.
original_solution_mapping.L4: Thus, 235 - 200 = <<235-200=35>>35 more people watched the games this week than last week.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 6536.
    Returns: how many more people watched the games this week than last week.
    """
    # L1
    second_game_watchers = 80 # eighty people watched the second game
    fewer_first_game = 20 # 20 fewer people watched the first game than the second game
    first_game_watchers = second_game_watchers - fewer_first_game

    # L2
    more_third_game = 15 # 15 more people watched the third than the second game
    third_game_watchers = second_game_watchers + more_third_game

    # L3
    this_week_total = second_game_watchers + first_game_watchers + third_game_watchers

    # L4
    last_week_total = 200 # a total of 200 people who watched the games last week
    difference_this_vs_last_week = this_week_total - last_week_total

    # FA
    answer = difference_this_vs_last_week
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: This week, {second_game_watchers} - {fewer_first_game} = <<{second_game_watchers}-{fewer_first_game}={first_game_watchers}>>{first_game_watchers} people watched the first game.
While {second_game_watchers} + {more_third_game} = <<{second_game_watchers}+{more_third_game}={third_game_watchers}>>{third_game_watchers} people watched the third game.

A total of {second_game_watchers} + {first_game_watchers} + {third_game_watchers} = <<{second_game_watchers}+{first_game_watchers}+{third_game_watchers}={this_week_total}>>{this_week_total} people watched the games this week.

Thus, {this_week_total} - {last_week_total} = <<{this_week_total}-{last_week_total}={difference_this_vs_last_week}>>{difference_this_vs_last_week} more people watched the games this week than last week.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: This week, 80 - 20 = <<80-20=60>>60 people watched the first game.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: While 80 + 15 = <<80+15=95>>95 people watched the third game.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: A total of 80 + 95 + 95 = <<80+95+95=270>>270 people watched the games this week.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: Thus, 270 - 200 = <<270-200=70>>70 more people watched the games this week than last week.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'third_game_watchers' (value: 95) was used instead of 'first_game_watchers' (value: 60).
